metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000509 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr version 6.0.2 contains a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilityin Product details that can result in execution of javascript code.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
